name: Lynn
what_you_do: Lynn Scott Coaching provides coaching services focused on leadership development, team coaching, and training for leaders and managers to achieve measurable success in their roles.
who_you_serve: The coaching services are aimed at leaders, managers, and teams in various organizations, including new CEOs, senior managers, and experienced leadership coaches.
signature_programs: Leading with Impact programme, Winning Teams Programmes, Ultimate Team Coaching Solution
current_projects: Effortless Leader virtual coaching group (Coming Soon)
bio: ICF Master Coach with 14 years of experience, ILM endorsed programs, positive testimonials from clients.
business_focus: Lynn Scott Coaching provides coaching services focused on leadership development, team coaching, and training for leaders and managers to achieve measurable success in their roles. (leadership coaching)
